quotes.quote: Being on top of the world doesn't mean anything unless you know what it's like to be at the bottom.
If you're at the top, then brace for the fall.
On the top of each peak you are on the edge of the abyss.
Life achieves its summit when it does to the uttermost that which it was equipped to do.
Summit of the well is the bottom of the ground! Man who has climbed up from the very low thinks that he did climb up to the very top!
It's not just a question of conquering a summit previously unknown, but of tracing, step by step, a new pathway to it.
An apex is always surrounded only by emptiness.
You climb to reach the summit, but once there, discover that all roads lead down.
The summit is not the only place on the mountain.
The summit is just a halfway point.
There are no short cuts to the top.
No one ever complained their way to the top.
Sometimes you gotta leave when you're on top.
The one that works the hardest comes out on top.
The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
It may take us a little longer to reach the summit, but never fear, we will get there!
Somewhere between the bottom of the climb and the summit is the answer to the mystery why we climb.

Everybody wants to reach the top of the mountain, but there is no growth at the peak. It is in the valley that we slog through the lush grass and rich soil, learning and becoming what enables us to summit life's next peak.
Don't you dare get to the top and not know what to do.
No one starts out on top. You have to work your way up.
The top of one mountain is always the bottom of another.
Get on top of the obstacles and they become vantage points.
There is no top. There are always further heights to reach.
When you reach the top, keep climbing.
You climb to the summit and there is nothing there.
